attributes.action: Place an age under 14 NOT being placed into childrens homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like people to join together to help get an age limit to stop children under the age of 14 being placed into childrens homes.
I myself was placed into childrens homes when i was 12 and suffered and now i am watching my two 9 year old brothers going through the same thing one of them is on an unlicenced drug for adults (Prozac), which no body seems to think of the harm this is doing. If he wasnt in a childrens home he would have more attention and wouldnt feel left out or suicidal. please sign this to help me and others out there in need.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
